Our business

Roche Diagnostics serves customers spanning the entire healthcare spectrum - from commercial laboratories, research institutions and hospitals to physicians and patients.

See more Link: /be/en/about/about-roche-diagnostics.html

Centralised & Point of Care Solutions

The world’s leading supplier of in vitro diagnostic solutions, instrument systems, tests, and services.

See more Link: /be/en/about/centralised-and-point-of-care-solutions.html

Molecular Diagnostics

Enabling healthcare professionals to effectively diagnose and manage disease while personalizing patient treatment options

See more Link: /be/en/about/about---roche-molecular-diagnostics.html

Tissue Diagnostics

Providing staining and instrument systems that automate and optimize the tissue diagnostic process for faster, more standardized answers

See more Link: /be/en/about/roche-tissue-diagnostics.html

Sequencing

Innovating next-generation sequencing solutions that enable a deeper understanding of genetic mutations and inherited diseases

See more Link: /be/en/about/about-roche-sequencing-solutions.html

CustomBiotech

Products and solutions for manufacturers in the diagnostics and pharma biotech industry

See more Link: http://www.custombiotech.roche.com/

Diagnostics Information Solutions

Supporting oncology care teams with decision support solutions that provide the insights needed to help make the right diagnosis and treatment decisions for patients

See more Link: /be/en/about/about-diagnostics-information-solutions.html

Diabetes Care

Dedicated to helping people with diabetes to live life as active and unrestricted as possible

See more Link: https://www.accu-chek.be/fr/

Solution Integration and Services

Integrating diagnostics through physical and virtual workflow automation, software solutions, and business analytics
